text: Giuseppe Azzaro (15 October 1925 â€“ 5 June 2022) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Christian Democracy party. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 1963 to 1992. He was also Mayor of Catania from 1987 to 1988 and again in 1991. Azzaro died in Rome, Italy on 5 June 2022 at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian mayors Category:Politicians from Sicily Category:People from Catania
title: Giuseppe Azzaro
